CustomProperties.Name: DropDownItems
CustomProperties.Tooltip: List of items in drop down

CustomProperties.Name: SelectedText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property for the selected value text

CustomProperties.Name: Selected
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property for the output Selected property

CustomProperties.Name: Required
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to show that a selection is required

CustomProperties.Name: PrimaryOrange
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to toggle the primary color when the control is in focus.

CustomProperties.Name: DisplayMode
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to set the display mode.

Rules.InvariantScript:
//Use the RenameColumns function to substitute the sample columns names with your own.
Table({dropdownText: "New", dropdownValue: ""},{dropdownText: "Closed", dropdownValue: ""},{dropdownText: "Inactive", dropdownValue: ""},{dropdownText: "Pending", dropdownValue: ""},{dropdownText: "In progress", dropdownValue: ""})

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString:
//Any table can be used, even from a data source (i.e. SharePoint and others)
Table({dropdownText: "sampleText", dropdownValue: ""})

Rules.InvariantScript: If('Drop Down with Header'.PrimaryOrange = true, ColorValue("#D04A02"), ColorValue("#415385"))
If('Drop Down with Header'.PrimaryOrange = true, ColorValue("#D04A02"), ColorValue("#415385"))
